verbose_text: Even though Src expression and activity are not strongly sensitive to stiffness, FAK phosphorylation on Src sites (Y576 and Y861) and N-cadherin expression were low in SYF null cells (which are deficient in the Src family kinase proteins Src, Yes, and Fyn) when cultured on stiff hydrogels and restored by reconstitution of the cells with c-Src (XREF_FIG).
